page.title: 17A DAY IN MY LIFE............
page.content: In the morning my sister Nicola comes in to me to wake me up. I take no notice of her so she goes in to wake my mum up. When I hear my mum up I shoot out of bed. When it is about half-eight I am ready to go to school. In school I go in to do the late book, then come back to class to do some work and then I go downstairs to sell crisps. At twelve o'clock it is dinnertime. I go home for dinner and come back at a quarter to one. We go in at one o'clock then we do some work and go out to play later on. When we come in we do some more work then go home at half past three. At home when I have eaten my tea I play out and come in at half past eight. I have my supper, watch T.V., and go to bed at half past nine. Written by Andrea Devaney, St.Christophers Juniors.
